Global COVID-19 cases surpass 15.5M mark, death toll at 633,711 with more than 8.7M recoveries tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-748415 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/world/748415/global-covid-19-cases-surpass-15-5m-mark-death-toll-at-633-711-with-more-than-8-7m-recoveries/story/ At least 15,535,790 cases of coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) have been registered in 196 countries and territories and at least 8,718,700 while 633,711 people have died since the outbreak emerged in China last December, according to a tally from official sources compiled by AFP at 1100 GMT on Friday. Sat, 25 Jul 2020 04:38:39 +0800
Singaporean pleads guilty in US to acting as Chinese intelligence agent -US Justice Department tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-748411 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/world/748411/singaporean-pleads-guilty-in-us-to-acting-as-chinese-intelligence-agent-us-justice-department/story/ A Singaporean man who set up a fake consulting site to solicit information from US government and military workers has pleaded guilty to acting as an illegal agent of Chinese intelligence, the Justice Department said on Friday.
